Hell Drak/Necromancer

	Two stasis pods went flying down towards the soft earth with two very,
very, very skilled and experienced bots.  They both landed at the same
time, safely.  A substance called Energon prevented them from remaining in
robot mode so pod scanners looked for the nearest organic creature to
create a mode unaffected by energon.  Both scanners detected two very,
very, very large creatures flying ahead, just passing by.  The scanners
indicated that these two creatures were gigantic and were aerial, but they
had nothing to protect themselves except for using their tails, wings and
head bashing.  So basically, these creatures had no offensive weapons, and
would be suitable for emergency and escape missions.  The two bots inside
of the pods took these forms as their own. One of the pods opened up, and a
female bot stepped out.  Her name was Hell Drak.  She looked around to see
if there was any enemy bots.

	"This world is strange yet somewhat beautiful," Hell Drak said, looking
around in awe.  

	"Brother!  Yoo hoo!  Brother!  We're here!" Hell Drak shouted banging on
the other pod.  Out of the other pod, a male bot stepped out.  This bot was
named Necromancer.

	"Wow.  This world is beautiful.  So full of life.  I never knew such
creatures existed as the flying ones we saw.  We better get focused on
looking out for other bots," Necromancer said as he walked up to his
sister.
